name: NukeMan
description:
• Completable Within Recess
  • Foretells the Future
  • Suspense Collage
  • Good Habits Encouraged (Like Spelling)
  • Bad Habits Explored (Like Killing)
  • Weirdly Asymmetric

If you know the secret to the passwords, it becomes a lot easier to win.

Made with https://adventuron.io/

AI Generated Art by the RunwayML Generative Engine https://experiments.runwayml.com/generative_engine/

Additional artwork from ASCII Art Archive. https://www.asciiart.eu/
